title: Needs a lot of work
text:
You can't tell weather your a/c is running or not.

There is never any data to display - why is the tab even there? 

You can't tell how long your system has been running or how many hours your system ran in a given day/week/month.

Scheduling doesn't even show up on a Mac - has to be programmed through app

title: Poorly engineered
text:
There is very high latency between what you enter in the app and what actually gets registered in the device. The App will except your inputs and then throw them away. If you’re not careful you’ll not get what you want.
If you turn the system off and then on again the schedule will occasionally get hosed up where the sleep times etc are incorrect. No amount of fiddling will fix this, the schedule on and off etc. 
I think I have gotten the schedule back on track by changing schedules times saving them, and then reset into what they were.

title: Needs an update!
text: Come on guys. When is the UI on this app going to get updated to supported iPhone X/XS/XR? There is lost real estate on the top and bottom of the application. Would be nice to have this. The app also sometimes randomly disconnects from my thermostat and I can’t remotely use it. I just have to wait it out for like 15-20 mins. Killing the app doesn’t do anything. Please fix these 2 things.

title: UPDATE
text: Schneider,  update this app please. I have had no issues with this thermostat up until now the app will not connect to the unit. I would rather not spend the money and purchase another thermostat by a different company but if there is not a fixed soon I will be forced to move on.

title: Needs update
text: App needs update. With multiple thermostats the main screen doesn’t even tell you which one you are changing. Also latency issues. If schnider does not support this product anymore they need to give the user the dev software so we can do our own design and loop control programming.

title: Mike T
text: Love the app!  Never had an issue,  everything works great.  I have 4 thermostats and love them. This doesn’t get the credit it deserves.  If your internet connection is good,  the product works as it should!

title: Abandoned app
text:
This app in theory was going to be great, but it just has too many latency issues. I cannot depend on it to accurately update if I go on vacation and want to return it to a cooler temperature before I get home. It rarely does what it is suppose to do the first time.

Buy a nest, hopefully their owner won’t drop it like a hot potato. 

I have buyers remorse for trying to be different and support the alternative. Nest will be the replacement for sure.

title: Constant disconnecting
text: This app is constantly disconnecting on me and when I try to log in with the proper information I get an error and have to wait to try again. I know my info is right because I had this issue earlier and the only way to fix was to log out and back in, now I can't even log in.

title: Seems abandoned
text:
I hesitated to buy Wiser Air thermostats because I worried that Schneider would abandon the project. Now it seems they have. There have been no updates in nearly a year and all of the marketing channels of Wiser have gone silent. 

Best stay away and chose a brand that will stick around for a while.

title: Horrible!! Very disappointing!
text: It is unbelievably NOT user friendly. Just fire all of your UX/UI engineers and rebuild the app. It has minimal functionalities you can do a better job! Slow response, confusing menus, old design,…

title: Email verification not working
text: I changed my email address and now I’m locked out of this app.  It will not send the email and the app has no way out. Boo.

title: Email registration no longer works.
text: This app now requires access to a Facebook account.

title: Unable to sync app
text: Unable to sync device to app…. Any suggestion?

title: Wiserair seems dead
text: Looks like Schneider abandoned wiser air. EcoIQ keeps getting worse, and is now just useless. Time to switch.

title: Needs small improvements...
text:
Love our Wiser Air thermostats and love being able to adjust them with this app. We've got 2 units in our home and they work great. 

Only minor gripe is that the app can be quite buggy at times. When swiping between upstairs and downstairs thermostats the app freezes and often doesn't update to show the current temp and settings. It can be a real pain in the rear when I'm trying to see what's going on and adjust settings while I'm away. I keep hoping that the recent "bug fix" updates will improve this responsiveness, but they have not. Hopefully this is something the developer is working on. 

4 star for now, but fix that and you get a raving 5 star review =)

title: Clean, clear temperature control. Good.
text:
Have had for 2 months and works well. Really simple and clean UI for temperature control, multi thermostats at home, and set up. Specially good is the fact that the UI on iPhone is the ad and on the we portal and on the thermostat itself. 

I'm waiting to get the 'EcoIQ' learning algorithm to get a 5 star,

title: Excellent
text: Includes everything you need from a wifi thermostat and more, like reports and weather forecasts.
